contain 2 images of the Ministry of Justice during the Meiji Era

Now=
 you may think to yourself what does the Min. of Justice have
anything to d=
o with the Shinsengumi?

Well former members of the Shinsengumi Fujita Goro=
 and also Suzuki
Miki (even if he was not posted in Tokyo) knew these build=
ings very
well.  Trainings/meetings were often not held at the local
statio=
n---but at the central admin building, the Ministry of Justice
and or the T=
MPD headquarters because the Min. of Justice was the
"paperwork" center whe=
re alot of stuff was sent to for processing.

Other buildings in the files =
such as the Panorama structure, kabukiza
and sumo ring are one of the most =
popular places depicted in ukiyo-e
of that era as well.
